医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
GERD 如何增加月经大量出血的风险？研究探讨了常见胃肠道问题 GERD 与女性大量月经出血 (HMB) 风险之间的潜在因果关系。尽管结果尚无定论，但分析表明存在潜在的因果关系，表明这两种情况下荷尔蒙相互作用的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/How-does-GERD-increase-the-risk-of-heavy-menstrual-bleeding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/How-does-GERD-increase-the-risk-of-heavy-menstrual-bleeding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3d8d144-bcc9-4e93-a9d6-426e699e92a3 Sun, 27 Aug 2023 23:20:00 -0400 How does GERD increase the risk of heavy menstrual bleeding?
维生素真的能抗癌吗？新研究揭示了微量营养素与癌症风险之间令人惊讶的联系该研究利用孟德尔随机化方法检查了 14 种微量营养素与 22 种癌症结果之间的关系，发现较高的镁和维生素 B12 水平分别与乳腺癌和结直肠癌风险增加之间存在显着关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Can-vitamins-really-fight-cancer-New-study-uncovers-surprising-links- Between-micro Nutritions-and-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Can-vitamins-really-fight-cancer-New-study-uncovers-surprising-links- Between-micro Nutritions-and-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a769851-0a34-4f41-833e-e9475aa1af6e Sun, 27 Aug 2023 23:11:00 -0400 Can vitamins really fight cancer? New study uncovers surprising links between micronutrients and cancer risk
母亲肥胖通过 DNA 变化与儿童体重问题相关波士顿出生队列研究发现，母亲孕前肥胖会改变新生儿 DNA 甲基化，可能增加儿童肥胖的风险。该研究针对美国高危人群，可以指导未来针对儿童肥胖的干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Maternal-obesity-linked-to-childhood-weight-issues-through-DNA-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Maternal-obesity-linked-to-childhood-weight-issues-through-DNA-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6362bd24-3e6e-4c68-a968-a5e37accd081 Sun, 27 Aug 2023 23:02:00 -0400 Maternal obesity linked to childhood weight issues through DNA changes
限时喂养可逆转小鼠阿尔茨海默病症状，为可及的治疗带来新希望研究人员探索昼夜节律调节干预措施治疗阿尔茨海默病的治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Time-restricted-feeding-reverses-Alzheimers-symptoms-in-mice-offers-new-hope-for-accessible-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Time-restricted-feeding-reverses-Alzheimers-symptoms-in-mice-offers-new-hope-for-accessible-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73f16d8d-7b00-4e19-9323-8e3bc0fa26e6 Sun, 27 Aug 2023 22:52:00 -0400 Time-restricted feeding reverses Alzheimer's symptoms in mice, offers new hope for accessible treatment
研究发现 MRI 检测前列腺癌比 PSA 检测更灵敏最近的 BMJ 肿瘤学研究发现，使用基于年龄的 MRI 筛查可以有效识别前列腺癌风险，而与传统 PSA 水平无关。研究结果表明，基于 MRI 的方法可能是前列腺癌筛查的更准确替代方案，特别是对于 PSA 水平低于 3.0 ng/mL 的男性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Study-finds-that-MRI-is-more-sensitive-than-PSA-test-for-detecting-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Study-finds-that-MRI-is-more-sensitive-than-PSA-test-for-detecting-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd8aa0a1-3fb4-440f-b736-a2c5e899a6a8 Sun, 27 Aug 2023 22:42:00 -0400 Study finds that MRI is more sensitive than PSA test for detecting prostate cancer
青春期压力暴露会影响啮齿动物的大脑发育和行为啮齿动物的青春期压力暴露会导致海马细胞增殖、神经可塑性和认知障碍减少，以及抑郁样行为增加。这些影响可能会持续到成年，但影响各不相同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Adolescent-stress-exposure-impacts-rodent-brain-development-and-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230827/Adolescent-stress-exposure-impacts-rodent-brain-development-and-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39d06397-9639-4ffd-9a75-01da449e1d02 Sun, 27 Aug 2023 22:24:00 -0400 Adolescence stress exposure impacts rodent brain development and behavior
癌症药物研发的过去、现在和未来2023 年 8 月 17 日，《Oncoscience》（第 10 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“癌症药物开发的昨天、今天和明天”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/The-past-present-and-future-of-cancer-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/The-past-present-and-future-of-cancer-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3edd26ed-1f62-4ddf-baa1-cfc9cedd18b6 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:38:12 -0400 The past, present, and future of cancer drug development
研究可以解释为什么宇航员的 T 细胞在抵抗感染方面变得不那么有效瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究研究了失重如何影响免疫系统的 T 细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Study-could-explain-why-astronauts-T-cells-become-less- effective-at-fighting-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Study-could-explain-why-astronauts-T-cells-become-less- effective-at-fighting-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc9f9de2-5343-46e7-8875-433e169cdc19 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:27:07 -0400 Study could explain why astronauts' T cells become less effective at fighting infection
受折纸启发的应变传感器可以帮助检测疾病南加州大学维特比工程学院的研究人员希望通过折纸来创造新的传感器，这些传感器有朝一日可用于检测器官的变形，也可用于可穿戴设备和软机器人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Origami-inspired-strain-sensors-could-help-detect-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Origami-inspired-strain-sensors-could-help-detect-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6229d0eb-cf85-4d2a-9220-adb5cd562856 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:23:07 -0400
纤毛病：对 NSL 复合体作用的新认识非特异性致死 (NSL) 复合物是一种染色质相关因子，已被证明可以调节果蝇和哺乳动物中数千个基因的表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Ciliopathies-A-new-understanding-of-the-role-of-the-NSL-complex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Ciliopathies-A-new-understanding-of-the-role-of-the-NSL-complex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b411e44-f938-436b-88a1-a7bd1d6de510 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:17:31 -0400 Ciliopathies: A new understanding of the role of the NSL complex
